patchNotes.title: Talent Rework

texts.text: You can now cast it while performing a <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2>

general.developerCommentary: Not being able to use <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> in contrast of other skills while performing <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> seems a odd

texts.text: Decrease total <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> time to reach final destination and better tweak overall animation feeling or being able to animation cancel the ending

general.developerCommentary: Currently when you use <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> you sometimes feel 'stuck' in the end part of the animation thinking it should've already be completed but it is still performing, the numbers here is abstract because i want to subtract that feeling of being stuck on the end part of the animation and don't know what would be the exactly value.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Falstad always had 3 builds focused on doing damage but ALWAYS one of them underperformed my focus was to focus 2 builds of damage only and make the talents for <vanilla, abilities, basic 1> more niche focused and also bring some new talents to level 20. My changes are based mostly on my experiences with Falstad on tournaments, storm league and lore reading.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities, basic, 1> Strikes against enemies who used dash skills deals extra 80 damage. Passive: Increase <modified, abilities, basic, 1> range by 25%

changes.developerCommentary: I completely dislike how the vanilla version incentivizes Falstad players to play and bevahing strangely trying too much to finish the quest. For this reason i want to niche this skill in utility to not compete with the other quests but provide a selected value in some games

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Basic attacks against <modified, abilities, basic, 1> target refreshs one strike

changes.developerCommentary: With the removal of the <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> and <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> i wanted to give it a little boost.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: I split both bonuses on other talents

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: The objective here is to make this level about <modified, abilities, basic 0> whilst i bring here a talent that in MY OPINION doesn't belong to level 16

changes.name: <modified, abilities, heroic, 0>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Additional functionality: 15% of all damage from <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> is converted to shields that lasts indefinidelity.

changes.developerCommentary: I didn't want to change <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> because it's a fun ultimate so instead i gave it a little more power.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> renamed to <modified, talents, 13, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: While <modified, abilities, trait, 0> is active close allied heroes receive 5% stacking movement speed. This bonus is increased to 7.5% if Falstad Has shields.

changes.developerCommentary: With the buff i gave to <modified, talents, 4, 0> i took the chance to make level 13 all about <modified, abilities, trait, 0>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>
changes.developerCommentary: For me talents like <vanilla, talents, 20, 3> should come sooner as competition for level 16 comes strong in talents combos but i also faster Macro gameplay would benefit on how Falstad could be

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 0>

texts.text: Instead of double range increase the size of <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> by 15%.

changes.developerCommentary: Increasing the range for <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> never made much sense. Normally a Falstad player will be in good range but Size on other range really compete with the other talents as you could go for wombo combos.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: With all honesty for me that talent is a big problem, i changed some of other talents that i consider broken to the point of being unfun..in that case i just think the the number is too high and rarely anything could compete too how eazy AND strong it is.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Falstad charges up to 100 stacks by moving. When he reaches 100 charges the next Basic attack bounces 4 times prioritizing heroes and slows every target by 99% for 0.3 seconds with 1.1 increased range and 200% extra damage.
subtexts: It charges my moving, using <modified, abilities, basic, 2> or flight.
If you move with 100% movespeed for 5 seconds you fully charge it.

changes.developerCommentary: I taught https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/Fleet_Footwork rune from league of legends REALLY suits the idea on Falstad charging storm attacks

changes.name: <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> has two extra charges and applies <modified, abilities, basic, 1> to every target he goes through.

changes.developerCommentary: BRO there's no lore or good decision making..it's just funny to think about it
